title: Weekend Rewind
description:
The Padre Hotel presents Weekend Rewind with The Social Vibe. Boogie down on Friday and Saturday nights starting at 9pm in Prospect Lounge as turns up the tunes of the past and the present.

January 4th: Throwback Dance Party - 80's & 90's Mashups
January 5th: Throwback Dance Party - Millennium Dance Flashback
January 11th & 12th: Latin Dance Nights
January 18th & 19th: Vinyl Only - Funk, 80's New Wave, Reggae, Dance Hall
January 25th & 26th: TBD

21+
